billing.question: How is VIP membership billed?
billing.answer: VIP membership is billed monthly, takes effect immediately after purchase, and automatically reverts to regular user status after expiration.

cancel.question: Can I cancel VIP anytime?
cancel.answer: VIP membership does not auto-renew after expiration. You can choose whether to continue purchasing.

immediate.question: Do VIP privileges take effect immediately?
immediate.answer: Yes, all privileges take effect immediately after purchasing VIP, and you can enjoy VIP services right away.

safety.title: Important Reminder - Safety First
safety.coreMessage: üèÜ Moderation over success, health over winning

principles.withinCapacityDesc: Set reasonable goals based on your abilities
principles.healthFirstDesc: Stop immediately if you feel unwell and consult a doctor
principles.gradualDesc: Start with small goals and gradually improve
principles.safetyFirstDesc: Follow professional guidance and avoid dangerous behaviors

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: This platform only provides challenge recording and social interaction services. It does not assume any responsibility for any physical injury, health problems, or other losses caused by participating in challenges. Participants should reasonably choose challenge projects based on their own health status, ability level, and risk tolerance.

details.highRisk: High-risk activities (such as extreme sports) require professional guidance and safety equipment
details.healthIssues: Those with health problems should consult a doctor first
details.minors: Minors need guardian consent and supervision to participate
details.noMedicalAdvice: The platform does not provide medical advice. If you have any questions, please consult a professional
details.fullResponsibility: Participants are fully responsible for their actions and consequences

mentalHealth.title: Mental Health is Equally Important
mentalHealth.description: Maintain a positive attitude and enjoy the challenge process. If you feel too stressed or anxious, please adjust your goals appropriately or seek help. Remember: participation and trying itself is success!

agreement.title: I have carefully read and fully understand the above safety reminders and disclaimer
agreement.description: I confirm that I will participate in challenges reasonably according to my own situation and take responsibility for my actions
agreement.thankYou: Thank you for your understanding! You can now choose a challenge template to start your health journey üéâ

reminders.authentic: Please ensure the evidence is authentic and valid. False evidence will affect your trust score
reminders.noEdit: Cannot be edited after submission. Please check carefully before submitting
reminders.peerReview: Evidence will be reviewed by other participants
reminders.deadline: Cannot submit evidence after the deadline

tips.avoidBlur: Avoid blurry or too dark photos

tips.detailed: Description should be detailed and specific

tips.readable: Ensure documents are clear and readable
